alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 3:51AM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft
